snippet: A protester was shot and killed near the Iranian Embassy in Beirut, apparently in a clash between supporters and opponents of Hezbollah, the powerful Lebanese Shiite Muslim organization.
abstract: Protester Hisham Salman is shot and killed near Iranian Embassy in Beirut, Lebanon, apparently in clash between supporters and opponents of Hezbollah, whose military intervention in Syrian civil war has strained Lebanese stability.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and HALA DROUBI
byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad reported from Beirut, and Hala Droubi from Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Anne Barnard contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: A protester was shot and killed near the Iranian Embassy in Beirut, apparently in a clash between supporters and opponents of Hezbollah, the powerful Lebanese Shiite Muslim organization.

headline.main: Protester Dies in Clash That Apparently Involved Hezbollah Supporters
headline.print_headline: Protester Dies in Clash That Apparently Involved Hezbollah Supporters
